title: General
text: The amount withheld as tax under chapter 24 shall be allowed to the recipient of the income as a credit against the tax imposed by this subtitle.

logical_structure.result: The amount withheld as tax under chapter 24 shall be allowed to the recipient of the income as a credit against the tax imposed by this subtitle.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 31(a)(1)In General—The  amount withheld as tax under chapter 24 shall be allowed to the recipient  of
                     the income as a credit against the tax imposed by this subtitle.

title: Of Credit
text: The amount so withheld during any calendar year shall be allowed as a credit for the taxable year beginning in such calendar year. If more than one taxable year begins in a calendar year, such amount shall be allowed as a credit for the last taxable year so beginning.
conditions: more than one taxable year begins in a calendar year, such amount shall be allowed as a credit for the last taxable year so beginning.

if: more than one taxable year begins in a calendar year, such amount shall be allowed as a credit for the last taxable year so beginning.
logical_structure.result: The amount so withheld during any calendar year shall be allowed as a credit for the taxable year beginning in such calendar year.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 31(a)(2)Year Of Credit—The  amount so withheld during any calendar year shall be allowed as a credit  for
                     the taxable year beginning in such calendar year. If more than one  taxable year begins
                     in a calendar year, such amount shall be allowed as a  credit for the last taxable
                     year so beginning.

title: General
text: The Secretary may prescribe regulations providing for the crediting against the tax imposed by this subtitle of the amount determined by the taxpayer or the Secretary to be allowable under section6413(c)as a special refund of tax imposed on wages. The amount allowed as a credit under such regulations shall, for purposes of this subtitle, be considered an amount withheld at source as tax under section3402.

title: Rule For Backup Withholding
text: Any credit allowed by subsection(a)for any amount withheld under section3406shall be allowed for the taxable year of the recipient of the income in which the income is received.
